product.name: Retinol Serum
product.description: A derivative of vitamin A, designed to promote cell turnover, colagen production and skin renewal.
product.usage: It's for anti-aging, skin texture, hyperpigmentation and acne. Only use at night.
product.disclaimer: May cause redness .Do not use without sun protection (sunscreen).
product.prescription: Apply few drops to clean dry skin. Follow up with a moisturiser.

product.name: Caffein Serum
product.description: Known for ability to constrict blood vessels, reduce inflammation and improve circulation.
product.usage: Reduces puffiness under the eye, diminishes dark circles around the eye.
product.disclaimer: Skin sensitivity. May cause irritation on dry and sensitive skin and be cautious when applying with other products.
product.prescription: Apply few drops to clean dry skin. Follow up with a moisturiser.

product.name: White Skin
product.description: Whitening cream designed to even out skin tone.
product.usage: Whitens, brightens, and evens skin tone, reducing the appearance of dark spots and hyperpigmentation. Helps to inhibit melanin production, resulting in a brighter and more even-toned complexion.
product.disclaimer: Check skin allergies before use and also check combination with other actives in your routine. Check skin sensitivity to particular ingredients in the product
product.prescription: Apply morning and night, gently massaging into skin until fully absorbed. Use sunscreen with at least SPF 30 during the day.

product.name: Acne Face Cream
product.description: Anti-acne cream that reduces inflammation.
product.usage: Treats acne, reduces inflammation, and prevents scarring. Helps to unclog pores and prevent future breakouts.
product.disclaimer: May dry out skin, not suitable for sensitive skin. Use moisturizer to avoid dryness. Avoid using with other acne products.
product.prescription: Apply as directed by a dermatologist. Typically, apply a thin layer to affected areas 1-2 times a day.
